attributes.action: sack judge robert juckes qc for the sentences given to the murderers of mr eccles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the government are serious about crime, they should make an example of judge juckes by sacking him for giving a sentence of 13 and 11 years to the murderers of mr eccles. perhaps then other judges may not be so reckless or fickle when handing out sentences

rejection.details: The Judicary are independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
